props.sortAscIcon: Icon used for ascending sort button.
props.sortDescIcon: Icon used for descending sort button.
props.sticky: Sticks the header to the top of the table.

slots.[`column.${string}`]: Slot for custom rendering of a column.
slots.[`header.${string}`]: Slot for custom rendering of a header cell.
slots.header.data-table-expand: Slot for the expand button in the header.
slots.header.data-table-select: Slot for the select-all checkbox in the header.
slots.headers: Slot to replace the default rendering of the `<thead>` element.
